resources.string: Our bunny goes shopping! It has to try to collect the more expensive products into its shopping cart to spend as much money as possible. But watch out! The shopping cart might get full before the bunny is even at the register. So make sure not to stuff the cart with bargain offers and watch out for slippery floor. Try to loose extra money by collecting the items on your shopping list. So let the shopping begin!
Click the products to put them in your shopping cart. Choose more expensive products over cheap ones.
